item.title: Mange a domain with Domain.com and DigitalOcean
item.description: Most of the developers sooner or later will have to buy a domain for one of their projects, let it be hobby or commercial. I had this problem recently and most solutions that I’ve found were lacking, so I thought of this tutorial. I assume that you have already bought a domain at Domain.com and have created a droplet on DigitalOcean. Let’s start, shall we?
